short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for Ollacart. Add your items to OllaCart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the OllaCart browser extension, users can quickly add items to their OllaCart from any website, allowing users to manage multiple online purchases in one place. OllaCart's online shopping platform is a tool to collect products in one place for a later purchase while monitoring price, discounts, and comparable products.

In addition to its purchasing features, the OllaCart platform includes social sharing capabilities, allowing users to share items with friends and family and receive feedback on potential purchases. 

Overall, OllaCart aims to simplify the online shopping experience and provide users with a centralized platform to manage their online purchases and share their online shopping experience with others.
